Topic.Title: Will Benghazi take Obama down?

Message.Msg: You people are idiots. You live in your own little fantasy land. You can forget about grasping reality--that ship has sailed. But if I were you, I'd choose more pleasant fantasies. The Obama administration was lax with security at one embassy. Bush thought Afghanistan & Iraq were cakewalks. He had no plan and invaded two countries. Thousands of our country's best young men and women are dead because of it and tens of thousands more are permanently injured. Do you think anybody outside of your little Tea Brain hole cares about whatever you think about Benghazi? You people are pathetically transparent. You don't care about American lives. You care about your little egos which you've linked to politics and race. That is why you disgust people. In the real world outside of the Tea Brain hole Americans trust that the Obama administration will address whatever happened in Benghazi with competence and care because that is how the Obama administration addresses everything.

Topic.Title: Will Benghazi take Obama down?

Topic.Title: Will Benghazi take Obama down?

Message.Msg: Ricky, I find it hard to believe that you are so gullible as to think that what happened in Benghazi was not at least a massive lack of leadership. Any CEO of any company that failed that badly would be fired if he didn't resign. I fail to see what Bush has to do with Benghazi. He too made serious mistakes, like starting the DHS, but the point remains that the USA needs a new leader and even Biden looks better.

Topic.Title: Will Benghazi take Obama down?

Message.Msg: "Any CEO of any company that failed that badly would be fired if he didn't resign." Are you #$%$ kidding me? You want to boil this down to some trite phrase you heard on the conservative talk shows? Forget the fact that plenty of CEOs have remained on the job after deadly disasters. Obama is not a CEO of a company. He is the President of the United States of America. That means often has to send men and women into harms way. Sometimes those people are killed. It is you and your ilk who trivialize this and politicize these things. You and your ilk who get these young men and women killed. The Obama administration has and will continue to handle this with the seriousness and respect that it deserves. What you and your ilk have done is turned it into a farce. What about the parents? They have to watch this spectacle you and your disgraceful ilk have created.

Topic.Title: Will Benghazi take Obama down?

Message.Msg: ...“…the point remains that the USA needs a new leader…” – wilkes Well, there ya’ go…finally, you reveal what your real point is…which, incidentally, has nothing whatsoever to do with Benghazi…your point is that exactly like the entire GOP position during their pitiful campaign, your only goal is to lie, cheat and smear your way into further obstructionist (and futile, I might add) efforts at destroying the Obama presidency, as well as the Democratic party. Unfortunately, the forthcoming GOP circus is nothing but another pathetic Swift Boat attack, fueled by Fox news and Congressman Darrell Issa (who compromised the identities of several Libyans working with the U.S. government with the State Department communication memos he released. Encouraging the politicization of this attack is absolutely reprehensible.) Here’s what Fox commentator Juan Williams said about the GOP’s feeding frenzy about Benghazi last October: “Win at all costs and apologize later is the rule in political campaigns, and the GOP has seen Obama’s approval rating on foreign policy fall in the aftermath of the Libya attack. But this is one political strategy that is based on deliberate misinformation about the Benghazi assault. (In the piece he clearly spelled out the three lies being perpetrated...and he called them lies.) Here’s what he says about it now: “It’s waste of time…You want to go back to find out who shot J.R.” And he works for FOX, wilkie…and he’s calling you guys clowns!! “I don't think Obama will survive the questioning.” – more wilkes nonsense You really think so, wilkes? Okay, let’s do this. If this brings down the Presidency, I’ll donate $1000 to charity. If it doesn’t, you do the same. You in hotshot?

Message.Title: "What difference, at this point, does it make?"
Message.Msg: As we have seen many times over the last four years, there aint nothing going to stick to "Old Mr. Slick". Last January when Hillary was thrown under the bus by the "Big Bopper" she testified that it didn't matter why the attack occurred in Libya, but she took full responsibility. She also said that she felt real bad about it. I predict that we the American people are going to find out a lot about the attack on our embassy. We are going to find out a lot about the incompetence of the administration. And finally we are going to find out a lot about the stonewalling and cover up that has gone on to this day regarding the attack. But as Jay Carney has pointed out, Benghazi was a long time ago, and as Hillary told us back in January "What difference, at this point, does it make?". Yes my friends you got to hand it to "Old Mr. Slick" nothing that has happened over the last four years will ever stick to "Old Mr. Slick". "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Because they are the bad guys in the story. The problem in Syria is that we don't know who are the bad rebels and the good rebels and if both are lying. Obama made similar poor judgments in Egypt and apparently in Libya. Is he looking for strike three?
